description: Ryuji`s Espurr used to accompany the family on picnics on a hill near their home but ever since he and his brother each got a Nyasper from their father and evolved them into Nyaonix, the two of them started butting heads. Ryuji`s Espurr evolved into Ryuji`s Meowstic and none of its moves are confirmed as a Nyasper.
name: Nyasper (Ryuuji)
